channel.title: How do I edit a 508 Ipchanging client to connect only to my server?
channel.description:
Hey, title pretty much says it all. If you can, add me at game_ruler93@hotmail.com
I have a 508 ipchanging client and I want to make it connect to my server and my server only and automatically without people seeing my ip. I have it forwarded and everything but I want to make it more easy and simple for them, so can someone help me? Thanks!

item.title: How do I edit a 508 Ipchanging client to connect only to my server?
item.dc:creator: @warlock_999 warlock 999
item.description:
@warlock_999 wrote:

Open up client.java find the ip thats it connects to than change the ip in the “” to yours
